biocontainers.name: oncotator
biocontainers.summary: Oncotator is a tool for annotating human genomic point mutations and indels with data relevant to cancer researchers.

biotools.summary: Web application to annotate point mutations and indels with functional data relevant to cancer researchers. Annotations include gene names, functional consequence (e.g. Missense), PolyPhen-2 predictions, and cancer-specific annotations from resources such as COSMIC, Tumorscape, and published MutSig results.

bioschemas.name: Oncotator
bioschemas.summary: Web application to annotate point mutations and indels with functional data relevant to cancer researchers. Annotations include gene names, functional consequence (e.g. Missense), PolyPhen-2 predictions, and cancer-specific annotations from resources such as COSMIC, Tumorscape, and published MutSig results.
